entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
